title: I'm an alpha client tester, and i didn't receive the icon.
body: I got accepted to test the alpha client on October 13th (i have Email proof of this). I downloaded the client and used it. I submitted several bug and feedback reports. I logged onto my alpha client before the 15th of November and after the start of Preseason. I have not received the promised summoner icon for doing so. However, i did have to re-install the alpha client after it mysteriously disappeared from my computer last week.

replies.body: Thanks for helping out and testing!  Icons are being distributed, and aimed for completion on the 29th.  Hang on until then!
Im an alpha client tester on pbe, never got it on na cause i thought id just keep testing on pbe, how can i get the icon on na (since pbe icons arent important as everyone gets them)
